app.mqtt package¶

Submodules¶

app.mqtt.mqtt_handler module¶

async app.mqtt.mqtt_handler.insert_data(session: AsyncSession, data: dict, device_id: str)[source]¶

Insert sensor data into the database and ensure proper associations between users and devices.

Parameters:

  • session (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • data (dict) – The sensor data to insert.

  • device_id (str) – The device ID associated with the sensor data.

Returns:

None

app.mqtt.mqtt_handler.on_connect(client, userdata, flags, rc)[source]¶

Callback function for when the client receives a CONNACK response from the server.

Parameters:

  • client (mqtt.Client) – The MQTT client instance.

  • userdata (dict) – The private user data as set in Client() or userdata_set().

  • flags (dict) – Response flags sent by the broker.

  • rc (int) – The connection result.

Returns:

None

app.mqtt.mqtt_handler.on_message(client, userdata, msg)[source]¶

Callback function for when a PUBLISH message is received from the server.

Parameters:

  • client (mqtt.Client) – The MQTT client instance.

  • userdata (dict) – The private user data as set in Client() or userdata_set().

  • msg (mqtt.MQTTMessage) – An instance of MQTTMessage, which contains topic and payload.

Returns:

None

app.mqtt.mqtt_handler.start_mqtt_listener(app)[source]¶

Start the MQTT listener.

Parameters:

app (aiohttp.web.Application) – The aiohttp application instance.

Returns:

None
